item.description: Gloria will lead an afternoon hike at Sessions Woods in Burlington. This pleasant 2.6 mile walk is on a woods road. If we take a couple of short side trips to a beaver pond and to a fire tower, it may bring the total distance to 3 miles. Meet at 2:00 PM at Sessions Woods Wildlife Management Area on Route 69, 3 miles south of intersection of Routes 4 and 69 in Burlington. If you need to take Route 4 from Hartford to get there, allow enough time to get through Farmington!

item.name: Hike at Sessions Woods in Burlington CT
